nodes.text: Vertseth was the home planet of Vertseth Automata, a company that manufactured techno-service droids. Most notable of these droids was Todo 360, the personal droid of Duros bounty hunter Cad Bane.
Todo 360 was voiced by Seth Green in Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The name of the planet is a nod to the actor's name. "Vert" being green in French, thus Vertseth, the actor's name flipped.
